title: digital biometrics and password in Thunderbird
creator: erickamor8868
content: an addition of digital biometrics and password in Thunderbird to provide more security when letting an acquaintance use our smartphone and not access our email for privacy reasons.

title: Manual Setup not working for Android
creator: JaneGrey
content: I still use Thunderbird for Win 7 on my PC and it works great. However, it does not include the QR to import my pop3 Juno email accts to my new android with Thunderbird Mobile installed and manual setup is not working.
